title: Pocahontas (Captioned)
creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, James Pentecost, Mike Gabriel and Eric Goldberg
brief_description: The legendary tale of the meeting of Pocahontas, American Indian Princess, and Captain John Smith is vividly recreated with the Disney recipe for success; two cheeky animal companions, the racoon Meeko and hummingbird Flit, vibrant colours and captivating music. A film for the family to enjoy as Pocahontas learns to listen to her heart. Features the Academy Award winning score of Alan Menken and Stephen Schwartz.
